app.name: Autoform.ai
app.short_description: Autoform.ai fills out any customer form or spreadsheet automatically with AI
app.long_description:
Autoform.ai automates repetative form and spreadsheet tasks. As soon as a customer sends a form, Autoform will complete it and send it to you for review as a private note in your conversation.

 *95% faster turnaround*
Our AI data entry can accelerate your deals. Whether it's RFP's, Security Questionnaires, or any other type of routine forms.

*Accurate*
Autoform pulls data from knowledge bases or past forms you've filled out in order to accurately answer new forms.

Always Learning
With every form you send, autoform.ai pulls in that data to increase our knowledge base for future forms.
